definition: frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: The frost-free period lengthened, and the frost period shortened.
sentences.chinese: 無霜期天數增加，霜期縮短。

sentences.english: September to May the following year as the frost period, frost-free period is short, significant differences between north and south.
sentences.chinese: 九月至次年五月爲霜凍期，無霜期短，南北相差懸殊。
